context.title: Chromatogram Overlay
context.description: The chromatogram overlay can stack multiple opened chromatograms in one view.

context.title: Chromatogram Editor
context.description: This is the main editor. Right-click on it to choose chemometric operations.

context.title: Peak/Scan List
context.description: The peak/scan list can be used to manage the peaks or scans shown in the current selection.

context.title: Targets
context.description: Targets are library identifications of peaks sorted by match quality.
